700371f-a.title: Bronx: 251st Street (West) - Broadway
700371f-a.text:
West 251st Street, north side, between Broadway and Post Road. The
houses, the rears of which are seen, are situated on Post Road, at, adioin-
ing and north of the N.E. corner of West 25lst Street. The small drive-
way, on which automobiles are parked is the old Albany Post Road, at this
date (1937) nonwexistent.
July 18, 1935.
P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.

700572f-a.title: Bronx: Broadway - 251st Street (West)
700572f-a.text:
Broadway, west side, between West 251st and 252nd Streets, showing
greenhouses in the background, directly off the east side of Post Road.
July 18, 1935.
P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.
